What are you doing in the laboratory? Inverse element-based magic? Hmm. The Maple World's resident genius in science, #b#p2012017##k, knows magic as well as science. I've never heard about inverse element-based magic! It's nonsense!

Summon is when you call your loyal servant using magic. Usually, a summon has the same or similar power as you. If you use a summon according to inverse element-based magic, it seems possible to use another element in your attacks.

If a human learns two different kinds of magic, they collide. To get around this, other element-based magic is realized through summons. That is the principle of #binverse element-based magic summon#k! Hahaha! What do you think of my idea? Isn't it perfect?

It sounds interesting, though. Scientists pay no attention to common sense! I'll help you out! The reason you can't learn two element-based magic is two different types of magic will always collide. So to get around this, Say... #bsummon#k!
Good! You agree with me! Go and get ingredients to make #b#t4031451##k! I need #b10 #t04011005#, 5 #t04011003#, 5 #t04011002##k, and #b#t4031468##k. Go!
It's not easy to get #b#t4031468##k. Go to #b#p2030012##k who know well about ingredients. He will know how to make what you seek. Take care!
Do you think it's impossible?! It is not!
Oh! You gathered everything. Good. Let me make\r\n#b#t4031497##k! It will take time to make it. Please talk to me in a few minutes.
